definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
lit. the duck is the first to know if the spring water is warm (idiom)/fig. an expert in the field knows which way the wind blows
pinyin: chun1 jiang1 shui3 nuan3 ya1 xian1 zhi1

sentences.english: Goshawk circled in the mountains on the river surging with the cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 蒼鷹在山巒上盤旋，江水隨着絕壁激盪。

sentences.english: River is flowing into the east.
Standing beside the mighty river, I am very thrilled.
sentences.chinese: 我站在浩浩的江水旁，心潮澎湃。

sentences.english: 10th, Meng Xiangbin The wind whinny, the river water is cold, the brave soldier never to returns.
sentences.chinese: 風蕭蕭，江水寒，壯士一去不復返。

sentences.english: The Yangtze disgorges its waters into the East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 長江將它的江水傾注到中國東海。

sentences.english: Quzong Bridge and two-colored river water below.
sentences.chinese: 飛渡天塹的曲宗大橋和橋下匯流的兩色江水。

sentences.english: Water flowed from upstream, freely and unceasingly.
sentences.chinese: 上游江水不絕流來，永無止息。

sentences.english: Even if the waters of the Spring River were all tears, The flow of sadness would never end in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 即使江水都化作淚水，也流不盡，依然有愁苦在心頭。

sentences.english: Is it that the Xin'an River Reservoir is the very Qiandao Lake?
sentences.chinese: 莫非我們眼前的這座新安江水庫就是千島湖？

sentences.english: Emei Mountain Halfmoon wheels fall into shadow water level Qiang Jiang.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山月半輪秋影入江水位強。

sentences.english: Du Xueyan rushed to the intelligence swallow, thrown into the river chew.
sentences.chinese: 杜雪顏趕緊將情報吞下，嚼碎後扔進了江水。

sentences.english: But rivers flow tirelessly to the sea, never ending in exhaustion.
sentences.chinese: 而江水汲汲流於海，終弗竭也。

sentences.english: They sang the heroically "Song of Sportsmen of Wintertime Swimming", plunging into the ice-cold water.
sentences.chinese: 他們唱着“冬泳健兒之歌”撲向冰冷的江水。

sentences.english: Faint afterglow, sun reflected the red river.
sentences.chinese: 暈暈餘輝，殘陽映紅了江水。

sentences.english: The workers still kept on working in the river even though the water was icy cold.
sentences.chinese: 任憑江水冷得鑽心，工人們仍然堅持下水操作。

sentences.english: Geku phase hybrid river head, relative to not see what is in heat.
sentences.chinese: 歌哭相雜江水頭，相看不發情何屬。

definition: to beat against the shore (of waves)
to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
